name: Kurumi Miracle
overview: Kurumi Miracle is a mix between and adventure and a simulation game. The game is about a young girl that is send by her fathers to an island and got 100 days of training there to become a better witch. To do that she got to talk to all the town people and clear some different events using her magical powers to help the villagers. The game features different endings depending of the main characters of the town stats (that will depend of how well the player clear the game events) at the end of the 100 days. The game features cute cartoon 2d graphics and lots of dialogues.
